import { useState } from "react"; import "./Forms.css"; const Upload = () => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", likes: 0, views: 0, date: Date.now(), image: "", }); const handleUpload = async (e) => { setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, image: e.target.files[0].name })); }; console.log(userData); return (
setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, title: e.target.value })) } />
Choose your image:
handleUpload(e)} />
Preview
); }; export default Upload;
